name: Swap Jump
description:
►►►►► $4.99 --->> $0.00
►►►►► LIMITED TIME ONLY!

NOW WITH DOUBLE JUMP AND EXCLUSIVE POWERUPS!
-“The New Flappy Bird! I can’t stop playing :)” Sofia M.  
-“Brillant Gameplay, it’s really addictive!” Steeve T. 

How to Play: 
1.Tap Left or Right to swap sides
2.Tap one more time to JUMP!
3.Tap again while in the air to DOUBLE JUMP!!!
4.SURVIVE :D

Features: 
-Now with Exclusive Double Jump! 
-Now with Incredible PowerUps
-Simple & Intuitive control, dead simple! 
-Compete with the whole planet thanks to the Leaderboard! 
-Share your best score with your friends  :) 
-Awesome cartoon design, all the family will enjoy!
